title: Black Forest gâteau cream horns
description: These cream horns take on the fabulous flavours of a Black Forest gâteau, with kirsch soaked cherries, chocolate and toasted almonds.For this recipe you will need 12 cream horn moulds and a piping bag fitted with a small plain nozzle.
ingredients: 340g/12oz strong white flour, plus extra for dusting
1 free-range egg, beaten for egg wash
250g/9oz black cherries in kirsch flavoured syrup (drained weight), 12 reserved and the rest chopped
2 tbsp syrup from black cherries (see above)
50g/1¾oz toasted flaked almonds, plus extra for decoration
